channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What’s your VO2 max? The most important health metric you’re probably not aware of shows how fit you really are
item.description: VO2 max is one of the best indicators of your cardiovascular fitness—do you know yours?

item.title: DoorDash’s stock pops on S&P 500 nod. Here’s who else is joining the index.
Most Americans don’t matter to the economy like they used to
Thinking of buying the stock-market dip? Here’s what you should know.
Jerome Powell says the ‘net effect’ of the Trump administration’s policies on trade, immigration, fiscal policy, and regulation will determine interest rates in the future
item.description: The Fed chair reassured an audience at the University of Chicago the economy was in a “good place” despite “elevated uncertainty.”

item.title: In-N-Out’s billionaire heiress says she stood in line for 2 hours to land a job at her own store when she was just a teenager to shake the ‘stigma of being the owner’s kid’ and ‘earn respect’
item.description: "It really was that family pain and tragedy that really put each leader in its place."

item.title: Stocks end higher on Powell remarks, but S&P 500 still posts worst week of 2025
Social Security to increase overpayment withholdings to 100% from 10%
What would Tesla be worth without Elon Musk?
item.description: Investors are starting to examine what they've long ignored: Tesla's bedrock value minus the "Musk premium."

item.title: Don’t call me a founder—I’m a female founder
item.description: More women entrepreneurs want to drop “female” from “female founder.” Here’s why they shouldn’t.
